name: Chess Sphere (itch) (Betamaximus-128)
description:
Chess Sphere is played across multiple platforms, including VR.

Game pieces move infinitely in any direction, but only up to 7 spaces per move. Spaces will light up so you know where a piece can move.

Chess Sphere contains 6 new pieces in addition to the 6 classic pieces:

Delegate is the opposite of a Pawn, moves diagonally but captures straight.

Jester is like a Knight but moves one space further.

Ninja and Ghost are like Bishop and Rook, they can jump over pieces but only capture enemies when not jumping. They only move up to 4 spaces at a time.

Matador is the King's right hand protector, moves like Queen but only up to 2 spaces.

Genie has the capabilities of Ninja and Ghost. Only acquired by promoting a Delegate.
